    • 构造器详细资料

      • MergeFileManager

        public MergeFileManager(java.lang.String path)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Creates the BIN Input Stream. The constructor parses the header of BIN file.
        参数:
        path - the merge file path
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if the stream is closed or another IOException occurs.
